title: The man thrashed by the police in the video is not the accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case
subtitle: The man in the video is not the accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case. The video is related to an alleged rape case in Chittoor.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that Mohammad Pasha, the accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case, is being beaten up by the police in the video. The same video taken from another angle is also being shared with the same claim. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post.



Claim: Mohammad Pasha, the accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case, is being beaten up by the police in the video. Fact: The man in the video is not the accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case. The video is related to an alleged rape case in Chittoor. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

The four people accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case are Mohammad Areef, Jollu Shiva, Jollu Naveen, and Chintakunta Chennakeshavulu.



When the screenshots of the video were run through the Google Reverse Image Search, the similar visuals were found in a YouTube video uploaded by the ‘NTV Telugu’ channel on 26t November 2019, i.e. before the Hyderabad incident. In the video, it can be found that the accused was being beaten by the police for allegedly raping a 10-year-old girl.

Also, ‘The Hindu’ has published an article on this incident with the title: ‘Accused in rape case thrashed by cops, public in Chittoor”.

To sum it up, the man thrashed by the police in the video is not the accused in the Hyderabad veterinary doctor rape-murder case.
